name: Young Amethyst Dragon
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 20

traits.name: Feedback Aura
traits.desc: Each time the dragon takes damage, all creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or else take 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
